特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
【合併】英語IIｂ　１１（経済学部）/英語IIIｂ　１１（経済学部）
授業方法: Class will normally begin with warmup questions about recent events or the weather. There will be ample opportunity for pair work.

第1回: Course overview; introductions; Spring Semester - Discussion Questions (two rounds); instructor's schedule.
第2回: Spring Semester - Discussion Questions (one round); Text, unit 1, pp. 2-3.
第11回: Text, unit 2, p. 18, dictation practice, p. 19.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to prepare for class and (when appropriate) review. They are also required to bring a pen or pencil, paper and a dictionary to class.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
評価.成績評価Grading2:
備考　Note
Class participation 30% Midterm (listening) exam 30% Final (interview) exam 40% Total 100%
